cards.title: Ed25519 Crypto
cards.description: Mathematical proof that we can't spoof commands. The same protocol used by Signal and OpenSSH.

cards.title: Nothing to Steal
cards.description: We store ZERO credentials. If ServerFlow is breached, hackers find an empty room. No keys to take.

cards.title: We Die, You Live
cards.description: If we vanish tomorrow, your business continues. No kill-switch, no phone-home, no vendor lock-in.

cards.title: Audit the Agent

list.title: Zero-Trust Security
list.description: We never access your servers. Agent initiates outbound connections only. No SSH keys stored, ever.

list.title: Hot Patching
list.description: Deploy code changes in < 2 seconds. Auto-rollback if crash detected within 10s. Perfect for AI iteration loops.

list.title: Multi-Cloud Native
list.description: Hetzner, DigitalOcean, OVH, Vultr, AWS, Scaleway... Your VPS, your rules. Zero vendor lock-in.

list.title: MCP Integration
list.description: Deploy via natural language with Claude or Cursor. "Deploy my app to production" just works.

list.title: Auto SSL & Nginx
list.description: Let's Encrypt certificates generated automatically. Nginx configured in seconds. HTTPS by default.

list.title: Self-Healing
list.description: Services auto-restart on failure. PM2 process management. Your apps stay online even if we don't.

list.name: Alex Chen
list.text: I used to spend 3 hours configuring Nginx and Let's Encrypt for each new project. Now I paste one command and I'm live on my $5 Hetzner VPS in under 5 minutes. Game changer for shipping fast.

list.name: Sarah Miller
list.text: Finally something that bridges local AI coding and real production without the Vercel markup. I keep my infrastructure, I keep my money. ServerFlow just handles the deployment magic.

list.name: Thomas Dubois
list.text: The MCP integration is insane. I literally told Claude 'deploy the new feature to staging' and it happened. No context switching, no terminal, just shipping. My team's velocity doubled.

list.name: Emma Rodriguez
list.text: I was skeptical about the Zero-Trust claims. After auditing the agent code, I'm impressed. Outbound connections only, Ed25519 signing, no credentials stored. This is how it should be done.

list.name: Marcus Johnson
list.text: I manage 12 side projects across 4 different VPS providers. ServerFlow unified everything in one dashboard. Hot patching means I can iterate with Claude and see changes in 5 seconds. Addictive.

footer.tagline: The Zero-Trust Bridge for AI-Native Deployment.

cicd.title: Git push. That's it. Your code is live.
cicd.description: Connect your GitHub repo once. Every push triggers auto-deploy. No YAML files, no Jenkins, no GitHub Actions to configure. ServerFlow detects your stack, builds your app, and deploys with zero-downtime. Rollback to any commit in one click if something breaks.
cicd.feature1Desc: Node.js, Python, PHP, Go, Docker... We analyze your repo and configure everything automatically.
cicd.feature2Desc: Webhook integration. Push to main, your app rebuilds and deploys instantly.
cicd.feature3Desc: Every PR gets a unique preview URL. Test before merging. Delete on merge.
cicd.feature4Desc: Something broke? One click to restore any previous deployment. No downtime.

runtimes.title: Stop configuring. Start shipping code that matters.
runtimes.description: Every minute spent on DevOps is a minute stolen from your product. ServerFlow auto-detects your stack, configures the optimal runtime, and deploys in seconds. Node, Python, PHP, Go, Rust, Ruby — we handle the boring parts so you can focus on building what users actually pay for.

databases.title: Your data is sacred. We treat it that way.
databases.description: One misconfigured permission and your business is on Hacker News for the wrong reasons. ServerFlow locks down your databases from day one — strict user isolation, encrypted connections, automatic backups. Sleep soundly knowing your PostgreSQL, MySQL, and Redis are fortress-hardened by default.

security.title: We can't access your servers. Even if we wanted to.
security.description: Most platforms store your SSH keys and "promise" not to look. We took a different approach: we literally cannot access your servers. Outbound-only connections, Ed25519 cryptographic signatures, automatic SSL, and military-grade firewalls. If ServerFlow disappears tomorrow, your sites stay online.

email.title: Your inbox, your rules. No Google required.
email.description: Why pay $6/user/month for Gmail when you own a $5 VPS? ServerFlow deploys a complete email stack — Postfix, Dovecot, Rspamd, ClamAV — with automatic SPF/DKIM/DMARC configuration. Maximum deliverability, zero surveillance, total sovereignty over your communications.

mcp.title: Talk to your server. Literally.
mcp.description: ServerFlow speaks MCP — the protocol that lets Claude, Cursor, and ChatGPT control real infrastructure. Deploy, rollback, check logs, manage domains — all in plain English. Your AI assistant becomes your DevOps team.
mcp.feature1Desc: "Deploy my app to production" — and it happens. No terminal, no clicking, no context switching.
mcp.feature2Desc: "How's the server doing?" — instant CPU, RAM, disk stats. Diagnose issues in natural language.
mcp.feature3Desc: "Add SSL to blog.mysite.com" — Nginx configured, certificate issued, live in seconds.
mcp.feature4Desc: "Why is the API slow?" — AI analyzes logs, suggests fixes, and can apply them instantly.

multicloud.title: Your VPS. Your provider. Your rules.
multicloud.description: ServerFlow doesn't host anything. You keep your favorite provider — OVH, Scaleway, Hetzner, DigitalOcean, Vultr, AWS — and we handle the orchestration. One dashboard, unlimited providers. Zero vendor lock-in.
multicloud.feature1Desc: Hetzner €4/mo, OVH starter, Scaleway DEV1... If it runs Linux, it runs ServerFlow.
multicloud.feature2Desc: Production on Hetzner, staging on DigitalOcean, dev on your Raspberry Pi. All in one view.
multicloud.feature3Desc: You pay your provider directly. No markup, no middleman. ServerFlow only charges for orchestration.
multicloud.feature4Desc: Your servers, your data, your contracts. We're just the bridge — never the landlord.

forAll.title: "It works on my machine" → "It works everywhere."
forAll.description: Whether you're a senior dev tired of writing YAML, or you just shipped your first app with Claude — deployment should take 5 minutes, not 5 hours. ServerFlow handles the boring infrastructure stuff so you can focus on what matters: building.
forAll.feature1Desc: Built your app with Cursor, Claude, or ChatGPT? We detect the stack and deploy automatically.
forAll.feature2Desc: You know how to configure Nginx. But do you want to? Let ServerFlow do it in 47 seconds.
forAll.feature3Desc: Everything from the dashboard or via AI chat. Command line is optional, not mandatory.
forAll.feature4Desc: SSL, firewalls, process managers, auto-restart — all configured to best practices out of the box.

databases.title: Ironclad Databases
databases.description: Your data is your capital. We protect it with automatic armor and optimized performance.
databases.postgresql: The global SQL standard. Strict user isolation and hardened HBA config by default for total security.
databases.mysql: MySQL & MariaDB at their peak. Automatic vulnerability patching and optimized indexing for lightning queries.
databases.redis: Ultra-fast real-time cache. Data encryption and password rotation for absolute peace of mind.

webProxy.title: Light-Speed Connectivity
webProxy.description: Crush latency. Intelligent routing and bank-grade SSL security across all your domains.
webProxy.nginx: The standard of web excellence. Dynamic Reverse Proxy configured for 99.99% uptime and zero-downtime deployments.
webProxy.haproxy: Ultimate high availability. Intelligent load balancing and automatic failover for critical infrastructures.
webProxy.letsencrypt: Free high-security SSL for life. Seamless automated renewal. Your users are always protected.

security.title: Native Security Fortress
security.description: Sleep soundly. Your server is transformed into a digital bunker from the very first second.
security.fail2ban: The anti-intrusion shield. Immediate banning of brute-force attempts on SSH and your applications.
security.ufw: Impenetrable perimeter security. Only essential ports are open. All suspicious traffic is annihilated.
security.wireguard: The private tunnel of the future. End-to-end encrypted inter-server communications with zero performance impact.

email.title: Total Email Sovereignty
email.description: Take back full control. Guaranteed deliverability, zero spying, and absolute independence from Big Tech.
email.postfix: Indestructible SMTP engine. Automatic SPF/DKIM/DMARC config so your emails always land on top.
email.dovecot: Ultra-secure IMAP/POP3 access. Your data, your storage, your own private messaging Cloud.
email.rspamd: AI-powered Inbox. Cutting-edge predictive filtering to eliminate spam and phishing before they reach you.
email.opendkim: Prestige authentication. Gain the trust of global receiving servers instantly.
email.clamav: Integrated industrial antivirus. Every attachment is scanned in real-time to protect your business.

monitoring.title: 360° Observability
monitoring.description: Stop guessing. Master every metric with real-time dashboards and predictive alerts.
monitoring.pm2: The brain of your Node apps. Smart log management, auto-restart, and native clustering for total stability.
monitoring.netdata: The cockpit of your infrastructure. CPU, RAM, and network visualized to the millisecond in a fluid interface.
monitoring.loki: Your system's memory. Ultra-fast log centralization and analysis to resolve incidents in seconds.

backup.title: Indestructible Backups
backup.description: Zero data loss. Period. Universal Cloud synchronization and end-to-end encrypted snapshots.
backup.rsync: Surgical synchronization. Fast incremental transfers for constant protection without loading your network.
backup.rclone: The universal Cloud bridge. Compatible with 40+ destinations (S3, Drive) for total geographical redundancy.
backup.restic: The ultimate digital vault. Deduplicated and encrypted backups ensuring maximum efficiency and security.
